document_data.name: cursed Imaskari gloves
document_data.mainbody: The '''cursed Imaskari gloves'''<ref group="note">Note that this pair of gloves is never referred to using this name in the book: it is merely described. were a pair of gloves, an Imaskari relic unearthed from the ruins of Solon by the slaves of [[Ambuchar Devayam]].{{cite book/Blood Charge|54}}
document_data.Powers: When worn, they slowly constricted. Within two minutes, the wearer's hands were rendered mangled, useless stumps.
